definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.english: The first stop on most excursions is the Parthenon on the hill of the Acropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數遊覽的第一站是在雅典衛城帕特農神廟山。

sentences.english: The Spartans withdrew their garrison from the Athenian Acropolis, and democracy was restored.
sentences.chinese: 斯巴達人從雅典衛城撤回駐軍，民主得以恢復。

sentences.english: The Acropolis is the focal point of Athens.
sentences.chinese: 雅典衛城的縮寫，是一種民主的象徵。

sentences.english: Rendering of the inside of the Acropolis and it's statue of Athena.
sentences.chinese: 表現雅典衛城內部和它的雅典娜雕像。
